title: Never found my groove?
body: I cant seem to find a champ AND role im good at most of the time or comfortable with, any tips?

replies.body: Free week champs every week, play them.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V8MFlWgo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-20T09:26:08.134+0000)
>
> Free week champs every week, play them.

I have been, i play some for a few matches DO GOOD ON MY FIRST MATCH (yes caps) then do horrid straight after they are gone, mainly 6300 champs bcz they are in my mind so much better. I have done good with diana,azir,urgot braum for my first match, but i havent gotten round to getting enough ip due to not having a good role to carry me through to getting ip. it takes me like a week of straight wins to get the ip and if i lose on a 50/50 ratio its worse not by x2 lol
Go through the champs you own then, find one you like, and get good on it.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V8MFlWgo,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-20T09:33:11.186+0000)
>
> Go through the champs you own then, find one you like, and get good on it.

Thats the thing, i see a champ think i might like them (after watching millions of videos) then hate them when i actually get to play (not on free week)
Well what sort of champion do you actually enjoy playing, answer that first.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V8MFlWgo,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-20T09:39:01.375+0000)
>
> Well what sort of champion do you actually enjoy playing, answer that first.

Hahaha kind of what the post is about :P (tho the title and desc werent clear enough)

What i mean is what mechanics you enjoy over the actual champions.

For example nidalee is my biggest comfort pick of a champion and probably the one champ i have the most fun on, and she benefits the most from Quick mechanics (the difference between a good and a bad nidalee), and accurate skill shots.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V8MFlWgo,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-20T09:51:18.477+0000)
>
> What i mean is what mechanics you enjoy over the actual champions.
> 
> For example nidalee is my biggest comfort pick of a champion and probably the one champ i have the most fun on, and she benefits the most from Quick mechanics (the difference between a good and a bad nidalee), and accurate skill shots.

It all comes back to the same thing doe ';> What do i enjoy, i cant find anything usually BUT I keep playing bcz smite isnt better and neither is dota, but i enjoy the genre

Don't watch thousands of videos before you play the champion. Maybe just watch one. I don't ever start with watching videos because if the player is really good with the champion this may cause me to place unrealistic expectations with what I can do with that champion. Then you feel disappointed that you didn't do too well for a series of games. I mean you can't win every match but if you focus on mechanically getting better as well as having better awareness, wards and objectives it amplifies that experience.

I like Braum because you can deep ward without feeling like the enemy jungler with 100-0 you. 

Champions like Yasuo rely heavily on positioning. With Yasuo you have to constantly be aware of where the minions are and what pathways would be available to reach the enemy target (E). I enjoy that about Yas.

The only shapeshifting champion I own is Quinn. Her Valor form is a completely different playstyle and needs certain requirements to be effective with. She's an ADC/Assassin.

If you're after top lane, I recommend trying out Rumble as he can be quite a lot of fun and can make a huge impact in team fights. Missing ult = lose, hitting a great ult = win
Mid lane wise, try playing Cassiopia as she can be very satisfying landing a good ult or poisoning someone and dpsing them. If not, try Syndra! She's really fun to combo and erase champions with
ADC wise, i'd say try Varus as he's got good utility and can deal a tonne of mixed damage
Support, I love blitzcrank and leona. Very satisfying to pull in squishies or CC train with leona
Jungle is pretty fun no matter who you play. All about the ganks/invades :) If you are up for it, try Evelynn. No wards are gonna find ya (except for pinks. But those you can just kill and then come back a few seconds later ^^)

> [{quoted}](name=FideiAngelus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V8MFlWgo,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-20T10:56:03.748+0000)

> Mid lane wise, try playing Cassiopia as she can be very satisfying landing a good ult or poisoning someone and dpsing them. If not, try Syndra! She's really fun to combo and erase champions with
> ADC wise, i'd say try Varus as he's got good utility and can deal a tonne of mixed damage
> Support, I love blitzcrank and leona. Very satisfying to pull in squishies or CC train with leona
> Jungle is pretty fun no matter who you play. All about the ganks/invades :) If you are up for it, try Evelynn. No wards are gonna find ya (except for pinks. But those you can just kill and then come back a few seconds later ^^)

I have played all of them but syndra, hoping for syndra and cass for next week <3

Did you like any of them? They all require some skills and the true fun mechanics start when you master them :)
Syndra is a lot of fun! Just being able to grab their buffs make her hilarious haha
do an a-z champ playthrough, if you go well on one play them again until you master them

> [{quoted}](name=astrapoof,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=V8MFlWgo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-20T10:39:34.778+0000)

So i tried rengar (jg) it went well early, went 3/0 then 3/1 bcz im an idiot and tried to fight brambleback when i was low.. later on i got a few kills a few deaths, but bot lane starts feeding.. i dont say anything but it keeps happening... our teamfighting was weak tho we had a kal,sion,malphite etc we lost and it made me sad (;-;) hes the match http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/90415380/201165666?tab=overview

very good idea, with 1-2 flaws, waiting for champs on rotation takes like um 10 weeks for all? not including ekko (yet), but i do wanna hold an event in my home town so i might get inspiration from someone there
